summary:
I'm a  UX/UI Designer currently living in Amsterdam. Before transitioning to design, I worked as a film director. I have always enjoyed working with visual stories, so embarking on a career as a designer has been a fulfilling journey for me. It allows me to combine my passion for aesthetics with the creation of great products that actually solve real needs.

Among my UX/UI design skills are the following:
✓ Develop UX strategy
✓ Conduct quantitative and qualitative user research and competitive analysis
✓ Ideate user-centered design solutions
✓ Build design systems via atomic design methodology in Figma
✓ Create visual brand guidelines and principles
✓ Deliver high fidelity prototypes for (native) mobile and web apps
✓ Perform usability testing

Tools: Figma | Webflow | Adobe Creative suite | Animation | HTML & CSS

I want to pursue a career where I can focus on both storytelling and design. The possibilities that will be available in the upcoming years with augmented reality (AR) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) are something I would really like to dedicate my time to. Not only does it challenge the way we have traditionally thought about design, but it will also open a whole new realm of possibilities

Feel free to reach out to me via LinkedIn. I'm always open to connecting and discussing potential opportunities.
